README GDHQ - Running out of Time - release alpha 1.0

Running out of time

This is the alpha version of SFA and was launched for the GameDevHQ Gamejam.

Updates
  • Quick fix patch. 0.0.02 — 8-25-22
    • fixed holes in walls. No more dropping off the level.
    • Reduce mouse turn speed (future update will have settings for this)
    • Fixed issue with shooting. You can now kill the enemy.
    • Audio que for shooting added.
  • Initial launch — 8-21-22

Initial Game jam launch. There will be future updates.

  • initial game launch
  • Hostage rescue mode — get the hostage and extract them before time runs out.

💡 There are known issues with this version. Please report any crashes, errors, or bugs you may find to sluggagames@gmail.com

Soldier Fight Academy

The academy trains soldiers to fight against extraterrestrial beings on Earth and in Space. You are one of the first few cadets. Complete the training level and deploy on your first mission. Survive and rescue the Hostages in time.

Goal

The goal of this game is to locate and rescue the hostage/survivor in the level. Try not to get killed by the creatures in the game or run out of time. Note: the alpha version is only the Training level demo. The training level is a bit ridiculous with the AI and attempting to reach the Hostage. This is somewhat by design until further AI tweaks are made.

Known Issues

Some issues I decided to leave alone until the deadline of the game jam. Below or some of the issues I have found and that will be addressed in a later update.

  • Hostage tends to randomly stop following even when player is still in range, lets call them timid.
  • Volume control in the options menu does not work
    • muting does not work properly as well
  • There is no score tracking as of yet you either win or lose
  • Gameover currently transitions you to the Main menu screen, if you end up there it was probably cause you die (may be fixed before reading this)
  • enemy is very fast and lethal
